participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Creative and quirky, Maya often expresses herself through her love for dogs and dancing. She has a playful side but is also practical.
participant_1.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Humorous and slightly eccentric, Oliver has a whimsical view of life that comes through in his interactions. He values creativity and has a strong connection to his childhood.
participant_2.background: i have a german shepherd named barnaby. my favorite color is grey. i'm terrified of scorpions. my father drove a car for nascar. i'm employed by the us postal service.

content.text: On Monday, I'm going to have to tell my kindergarten class, who I teach not to run with scissors, that my fiance ran me through with a frickin' broadsword.
Ms. Sylvester, I'm just not comfortable in those Cheerios! skirts.
Me Shake Weight and me bikiniwax treatment.
What do you like to eat
Here, I'II put little feet on my hamburger.
See, I have to plant my tree.
